headline.main: Diabetes Risk Grows for Baby Boomers

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: THE number of diabetics in the United States is expected to increase dramatically as baby boomers -people born between 1946 and 1964 -reach their 40's and beyond. The increase will raise health-care costs, strain hospital resources and expand the market for diet foods, medical supplies and other health products.
